comments:
I created a simple Managed C project, the thing get's compiled without messages
and it runs, but if I'm not able to debug it. If I start debug I got:
'Error creating session: Target is not responding.

I have not changed the default settings eclipse tries to connect to gdb via
/dev/ttyS0, I set the proper permissions. 

I'm using jdk_1.5. 
My system is an AMD64 Debian/unstable 

I don't know if this jdk can be used with eclipse, just it's the only one which
I got running on this AMD 64 box. 

However even while starting I got a bunch of errors, I'll attach it FYI

Closing -- no response, so it is unlikely that this issue is real.  I will assume that the x86_64 bit version of CDT was not used.
